page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT BLYTH
page.content: {We did a survey in our class of the {jobs our dads and mams do. Most of the men work in the coal mines. The second most popular job for men is factory work. Other jobs were things like electrician, policeman, machanic and labourers. Out of the fifty men in our survey eight were unemployed. Most dads work in Blyth or in the towns nearby. Four dads work abroad. Half of the mams we found out about stay at home. Most of those who work are either factory workers or shop assistants. All the mams work in Blyth. We looked at a survey of jobs done two hundred years ago,to see if the jobs had changed much. Then, most of the men were either sailors or had something to do with ships.There were no miners or factory workers.
